Metric-driven evolution vs. aesthetical intention

🌱 Seedling | April 09, 2025

Unwiring my brain

🌿 Growing | August 01, 2024

I find ability to share the ideas being in development beautiful and empowering. For my digital garden in its current state, I was inspired by and shamelessly copied Maggie Apleton's metaphor:

  • 🌱 Seedling: Early explorations, raw thoughts
  • 🌿 Growing: Somewhat developed, might have major iterations to come
  • ❇️ Evergreen: Mostly finished, at most minor iterations to come

Want to discuss and share your thoughts? Feel free to contact me 👋 (for now, email only)
